full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DAM CAN GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' STOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GIS GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG SNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA  MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIMS 'GROR, DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA 'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAMS PA SLOB PA, NYER MA BYAS PA'I BLON PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
